description: Observation-based atmospheric and oceanic climate forcing, lightning, atmospheric CO₂ and CH₄ concentrations.
description_note: Under development: Coastal water levels and tropical cyclone tracks and associated wind fields.

description: De-trended atmospheric climate forcing, constant CO₂ and CH₄ concentrations at 1901 levels ([CO₂] = 296.13 ppm; [CH₄] = 928.8004 ppb). Lightning as in obsclim.
description_note: Under development: Counterfactual coastal water levels.

description: Detrended version of the observed climate forcing used to spin-up the simulations based on a stable 1900 climate
Last 50 years of the splinclim climate forcing data
GCM-based pre-industrial atmospheric and oceanic climate forcing, CO₂ and CH₄ concentrations fixed at 1850 levels, monthly climatology of lightning.
description_note: Under development: Pre-industrial variations in coastal water levels and tropical cyclone tracks with associated wind fields.

description: GCM-based historical atmospheric and oceanic climate forcing, historical changes in CO₂ and CH₄ concentrations, monthly climatology of lightning.
description_note: Simulated variations in coastal water levels and tropical cyclone tracks with associated wind fields as derived from GCM boundary conditions.

description: GCM-based atmospheric and oceanic climate forcing as well as changes in CO₂ and CH₄ concentrations according to SSP1-2.6, monthly climatology of lightning.
description_note: Under development: Simulated variations in coastal water levels and tropical cyclone tracks with associated wind fields as derived from GCM boundary conditions.

description: GCM-based atmospheric and oceanic climate forcing as well as changes in CO₂ and CH₄ concentrations according to SSP3-7.0, monthly climatology of lightning.
description_note: Under development: Simulated variations in coastal water levels and tropical cyclone tracks with associated wind fields as derived from GCM boundary conditions.

description: GCM-based atmospheric and oceanic climate forcing as well as changes in CO₂ and CH₄ concentrations according to SSP5-8.5, monthly climatology of lightning.
description_note: Under development: Simulated variations in coastal water levels and tropical cyclone tracks with associated wind fields as derived from GCM boundary conditions.

description: GCM-based atmospheric and oceanic climate forcing as well as changes in CO₂ and CH₄ concentrations according to SSP1-1.9, monthly climatology of lightning.
GCM-based atmospheric and oceanic climate forcing as well as changes in CO₂ and CH₄ concentrations according to SSP2-4.5, monthly climatology of lightning.
GCM-based atmospheric and oceanic climate forcing as well as changes in CO₂ and CH₄ concentrations according to SSP4-6.0, monthly climatology of lightning.
